snippet: Suriname’s Parliament gave the former military dictator Desi Bouterse a second term as president on Tuesday with no opposition — or even a formal vote.
abstract: Suriname's Parliament approves second presidential term for former military dictator Desi Bouterse without opposition or formal vote; decision comes despite fact that Bouterse's party fell short of of majority required to re-elect him immediately.
lead_paragraph: Suriname’s Parliament gave the former military dictator Desi Bouterse a second term as president on Tuesday with no opposition — or even a formal vote.

headline.main: Suriname: Leader Named to New Term
headline.print_headline: Latin America; Suriname: Leader Named to New Term
